projectMottos.opportunity: Don't wait for opportunities, create them.
projectMottos.effort: Nothing is more important than effort.
projectMottos.passion: Passion and desire can break through all difficulties.
projectMottos.health: A healthy body is the cornerstone of achieving goals.
projectMottos.action: The road is walked out, not imagined.

todoItems.codeReviewDesc: Review the frontend code recently submitted to Git repository, ensure code quality and standards.
todoItems.performanceOptDesc: Check and optimize system performance, reduce CPU usage.
todoItems.securityCheckDesc: Conduct system security check, ensure no security vulnerabilities or unauthorized access.
todoItems.updateDepsDesc: Update all npm dependency packages in the project, ensure using the latest versions.
todoItems.fixUIIssuesDesc: Fix page UI display issues reported by users, ensure consistent display across different browsers.
